repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a manuscript of the Tātparyacandrikā, a commentary on the Bhāgavatapurāṇa. According to information provided in VOHD II, 9: p; 1205 entry 3852, the manuscript contains the commentary on Adhyāyas 41-91 of the Bhāgavatapurāṇa's 10th Skandha. The manuscript is wrapped in white paper.

msItem.title: Tātparyacandrikā
msItem.author: Veṃkaṭakṛṣṇa

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 16 p:284 VOHD II, 9: p; 1205 entry. 3852

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 pratyāha bhavātīti bhavān sahayātassan agre puriṃ gṛhañca praviśatāṃ vayantu iha ma (damaged folio due to worm hole.) va (2 syllables damaged due to worm hole.) kadā navamucyatavat puriṃ dṛṣyāmahe atra uraḥnāhamiti ahaṃ bhavatbhyārahi? ssarvaṃ purā puriṃnda praveśye he (3 illegible syllables.) salatāyate bhajanmāṃ
msItem.explicit: 145v 5 svāyaṃbhuvapriyavratadhruvaprasvādīrājarājā api yadarthaṃ yat paramaṃ dhāmaprārthayaṃ tassantaḥ grāmā vanaṃ yayuḥ puravaragrāmādinvihāyavanameva navase yayuḥ ..
msItem.finalRubric: 145v 5 iti śrī veṃkaṭakṛṣṇaviracitā 145v 6 yāṃ śrībhāgavatatātparyacandrikāyāṃ daśamaskandhe ekanavatitamodhyāyaḥ .. … iti śrīmatkārikavaṃśa? dhicandrasya śrīkṛṣṇāryasyasununā śrīmatveṃkavaradāryya kuvālabdavidyena śrīmadveṃkaṭa 146r 1 kṛṣṇāryanāmaka budhena viracitāśrīśrībhāgavatatātparyacandrikhā śrīdaśamo skandhaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ .. śrīkṛṣṇāya namaḥ .. hariḥ oṃ …. … karakṛtamarādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti 146r 2 santaḥ

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin, last folio is not numbered.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
